import React , { useState } from 'react'; import Categories from '../Categories'; const PostForm = ({ user_id }) => { const [post , setPost] = useState({ title : '', discription : '', status : '', cat_id : 0, user_id : user_id }); const { title , discription , status } = post; const onChange = e => setPost({...post , [e.target.name]:e.target.value}); return (

) } export default PostForm
